Teaching Statistics with R
======================================
Materials from a 2013 USCOTS Workshop
------------------

```{r, echo=FALSE}
displayFile <- function(path, text=path, type=c('html','Rmd','Rpres')) {
  result <- paste(text, paste("[[", type, "] ](", path, ".", type, ")", sep="", collapse="" ) )
  return(result)
  }
```

This is where we will post materials from our 2013 USCOTS Workshop.  Stay tuned for updates.  



### Tuesday

 * Introduction
 * `r I(displayFile("Workshop/RandRStudio/Welcome", "Welcome and Introductions"))`
 * Getting Started with R and RStudio
 * Getting the most out of Formulas
 * Getting Started with RMarkdown

Files By Topic
==============

<!-- ### Files by topic -->
```{r, results='asis', echo=FALSE, eval=TRUE}
directories <- dir('Workshop')
files <- c()
for (d in directories){
  cat(paste('\n####', d, "\n"))
  files <- dir(paste('Workshop/',d, sep=""))
  for (f in files) {
    if (grepl('.html', f) ) {
      cat(paste(' * [',d, "/", f,']', sep=""))
      cat(paste('(',d, "/", f,')\n', sep=""))
      }
  }
}
```
